string-array.name: about_content
string-array.item: Version 1.6 2015–07–03\nNEW: Support for Swedish word declinations, selection of language appart from the language name assigned. Kernel changes on Dictionary and other small things improved. Some icons changed and color button
Version 1.5.1 2015–05–16\nNEW: Pronunciation for words, section to listen pronunciation of texts and section to practise listening and pronunciation
Version 1.5.0.2 2015–05–14\nBig error when changing orientation in Language View solved. Some small bugs fixed and improvements
Version 1.5 2015–05–14\nNew Translation organization (inputing, storing and displaying), now you can specify the type of each translation. New Database format.
Version 1.4.1 2015–03–11\nNew kernel. More structure. Improvement on sending messages between activities
Version 1.4.0.3 2015–03–11\nRemove tenses asociated a removed words implemented. Better hints at introducing new words and stored words.
Version 1.4.0.1 2015–03–10\nSome errors fixed in tests when removing words. New Test descriptor. Tests better organized internally
Version 1.4 2015–03–09\nNew feature:THEMES. Learn faster. Create your own themes and make studing easier :)
Version 1.3.4.1 2015–03–07\nNow is possible to practise again in both ways.

Version 1.3.4 2015–03–06\nSystem of priority for words improved. Now the tests are certainly randomly chosen and the result shows the errors done, not weird percentages anymore. Special characters and explaining text completion now also available in Writing practise and Writing test section. Some other bugs fixed and improvements.
Version 1.3.3.1 2014–11–09\nError with the priority of words fixed. Reverse dictionary button in language screen now working

Version 1.3.3 2014–11–08\nLots and lots of internal changes done for improve performance and understanding. Added some new features: Phrasal Verbs elements don\'t displayed when the option is not selected in the language, Some Finnish verb conjugations, those of types 1, 2 and 3. Also conjugation view improved
Version 1.3.2 2014–11–06\nIncluded option of select setting languages on creation. Kernel preparations for supporting historial.
Version 1.3.1.2 2014–11–05\nAdded kernel support to Swedish and English verbs. Still not supported. Now it support more Finnish verbs conjugations
Version 1.3.1.1 2014–11–03\nAdded better support to Finnish conjugations. Still not finished. Conjugation view improved
Version 1.3.1.0 2014–11–01\nNew improvements to suport Tenses on Verbs
Version 1.3.0.20 2014–10–30\nAll remained coherence errors found solved: After modify/remove words and verbs.
Version 1.3.0.1 2014–10–29\n2 coherence errors adjusted on LanguageFragment. New internal Dictionary implemented for better performance.
Version 1.3 2014–10–28\n"Translation" change to "Search". Added Add word from Search. Solved problem adding word from Verb. Internal improvements on Add words. "About" visual changed
Version 1.2.0 2014–05–13\nImproved dictionary and related stuff. More common exceptions found solved
